name: Arrchfiend
author: Race
notes: Undefeated from L1 to kog, out of all the new decks this has been by far my favorite deck to play. Destroyed pretty much every deck on the ladder, ca, mirror, ssa, rez, Dinos, chaz burn, temple burn, ddraw aroma, aliens, and fish.
main0: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
